k_ele.e: 心の欲する所に従えども矩を踰えず

r_ele.r: こころのほっするところにしたがえどものりをこえず

sense.gloss: following the desires of one's own heart without transgressing what is right
exceeding (a limit, scope, one's authority, etc.), surpassing, going beyond
